name: Sunday School
description: Classes for K-Adult start at 9:30 in the sanctuary. Something for all ages to grow in God's Word.

name: Men's Theology
description: An evening of fellowship and discussion. Men gather to study theology together.

name: Ladies Bible Study
description: All women are welcome to come for evenings of fellowship and study. A time of community and growing in the Word.

name: Youth
description: Grades 7-12 are invited to come for an evening of games, snacks, and Bible study.
